name: VR-New Top Speed Car Racing Free
name_original: VR-New Top Speed Car Racing Free
description:
Buckle Up, Take control and boost speed to win the fast and free VR car racing game   It's your time to shine with a tons of extreme luxury racing cars to win the VR race at highest speed in a city traffic. Boost your top speed vr car racing engine at max speed to unlock your desire speedy car and drive it on a GT roads with a touch of virtual reality and feel yourself like a real racer. Enjoy the thrill of extreme adventurous 3d racing with rush of crazy luxury sports cars. This top speed vr car racing game play has a tons of luxury cars and two game mods. You have to choose classic to unlock time trail. Let's wear your vr glasses and get a real experience of top speed vr crazy car racing.
Features
vr effect to gives you a real feel of crazy racing. Smoothest gameplay to thrill the race. Fantastic music to vibrate your mind. A slow theme of drifting to add some thrill. Clock is ticking so try to win in a minimum time.  New Curly Maps to enjoy the stunts. Loads of luxury cars to unlock. Multiple game modes. Avoid traffic. Tons of car racer.
